data.expected_result: Discord should bring up the dialog that says no application can handle the link
data.short_description: Embeds with masked links that aren't links or don't have a handler crash discord when tapped
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure "Use Chrome Custom Tabs" is enabled - Send an embed that has a masked link that isn't a valid link or doesn't have a handler. Example markdown: `[test](.)` - Tap it
